title: v0.74.0 - Dynamic Context Window and Enhanced Model Support
description: Aider v0.74.0 introduces dynamic Ollama context window adjustment, improved support for o3-mini, DeepSeek V3 & R1, and o1-series models via secondary API providers. The release removes specific markdown tags from R1 responses for cleaner commit messages, adds temperature control in model settings, and includes Docker container improvements.

community_feedback.quote: Aider wrote 69% of the code in this release

title: v0.73.0 - o3-mini Support and Reasoning Effort Control
description: Aider v0.73.0 adds full support for OpenAI's o3-mini model accessible via 'aider --model o3-mini', introduces a new --reasoning-effort argument with low/medium/high settings, and improves context window handling with better messaging.

community_feedback.quote: Aider wrote 69% of the code in this release

title: v0.72.0 - DeepSeek R1 Integration
description: Aider v0.72.0 introduces support for DeepSeek R1 model with a convenient '--model r1' shortcut and OpenRouter integration. The release adds Kotlin syntax support to the repo map, implements --line-endings file writing option, and improves GPT-4o benchmark scores.

community_feedback.quote: Aider wrote 52% of the code in this release

title: Cursor 1.0 - BugBot, Background Agent GA, and Memories
description: Cursor reaches version 1.0 with major releases including BugBot for automatic PR code review, general availability of Background Agent for remote parallel task execution, Jupyter Notebook agent support, and the introduction of Memories for project-specific context retention.

title: Simplified Pricing and Background Agent Preview
description: Cursor introduces unified request-based pricing replacing the previous complex pricing structure, Max Mode token-based pricing for all top models, and a new Tab model capable of suggesting multi-file changes.
